hypothesis_content.title: ETH 15-Minute Volume-Weighted Extreme Reversion During Low Volatility Periods
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL or low-volatility BULL regimes, when ETH experiences a 15-minute price move >1.5% on volume 3x above 20-period average, it will revert 50% of that move within the next 45 minutes with >67% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Low volatility regimes create liquidity voids. Large volume spikes often represent stop-loss cascades or overreaction to minor news, not sustainable directional moves. Market makers and arbitrage bots quickly correct these inefficiencies. The 45-minute window captures this reversion while minimizing exposure to genuine trend changes.
entry_conditions: Regime == NEUTRAL OR (BULL with BTC 1hr volatility < 2.5%)
Volume for that candle > 3x 20-period average volume
Move occurs between 14:00-22:00 UTC (active trading hours)
Entry in direction opposite to spike on next candle open

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial spike move
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price extends beyond initial spike by 0.5%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Win rate < 58% OR more than 30% of moves continue in same direction (indicating breakout not reversion). Specifically falsified if high-volume spikes during these conditions lead to sustained trends >60% of the time.
